headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Triple Rewards on Open Wheel Races
content: Slip into that skintight flame-resistant speed-suit, strap on a helmet, and make peace with your maker. After all, the only things standing between you and the finish line are a fleet of your fellow racing lunatics and the cold, unloving laws of physics. All Open Wheel Races are rewarding the bravest racers in Los Santos with Triple Rewards until February 23.
